summary:
Tweaks the "Slow Time" Shout to:

Change the visual to a colorful, oversaturated one; Reduce the duration by almost half; Reduce the magnitude of the slowdown; & Reduce the Spell cost.
These changes make this Shout more of a quick run-and-gun tactic(and it looks pretty cool).
descriptionHtml:
Tweaks the "Slow Time" Shout to:

1) Change the "whiteout" effect to a colorful, oversaturated one.
2) Reduce the duration by almost half.
3) Reduce the magnitude of the slowdown(everything moves faster).
4) Reduce the "Spell" cost.

1st Shout(Tiid) - Duration 5(was 8); Magnitude(Higher is faster) .4(was .3); Cost 200(was 391)
2nd Shout(Klo) - Duration 7(was 12); Magnitude .3(was .2); Cost 300(was 611)
3rd Shout(Ul) - Duration 9(was 16); Magnitude .2(was .1); Cost 400(was 838)

These changes make this Shout more of a quick run-and-gun tactic(and it looks pretty cool).

My Other Skyrim Mods:

Bullseye Perk Paralyze Bug Fix - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/61363/]http://www.nexusmods...rim/mods/61363/[/url]
